hackathon-description-text: Building upon the success of ‘I Am An Immigrant,’  this year, ‘I Am An Immigrant’ launched a new initiative

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Entrepreneur, CEO/Founder of AlleyWatch, Founder New York Startup Lab, Technologist, and Advocate for Entepreneurship
Chief Community Officer | Managing Director, SF HQ at FWD.us

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=394 Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Impact:  What impact does your idea have on the users of your product?
Customer Validation: How confident are you that users will use your product?
Design: Is your product easy to use and understand?
Creativity: How is your product unique?
Business Model & Scalability: The potential in which you think your business will grow exponentially.
Technology:  The complexity of the technology used.

hackathon-description-header: Join us for 24 hours of hacking the immigrant experience.
